sentence.text: One of the mechanisms of the growth inhibitory effect is probably that S1PR2 inhibition lower the phosphorylation level of extracellular regulated protein kinase 1/2 (ERK1/2) pathway, which prevent the transformation of ovarian cancer cells from phase G(1) to S
Conclusions: The growth of ovarian cancer cells could be decreased by S1PR2 inhibition in vitro and in vivo.
